hero.title: Hello, I'm Jackson kitsao!
hero.p0: Cloud Applications Engineer | Experience with Media Streaming Technology.
hero.des1: I am proficient in Designing, Creating, Deploying, and maintaining scalable Services using JavaScript and recently Rust.
hero.des2: I have a wide range of experience in both backend and frontend development, My expertise extends to video compression and encoding with FFmpeg and 3D development using the Bevy game engine. My primary focus is on the Entertainment industry, where I leverage my skills to deliver cutting-edge solutions for video, audio, and gaming applications.
hero.des3: My current role involves Designing and Developing Scalable Distributed Services using JavaScript, Rust, and AWS to support the company's cloud infrastructure.
